locations: Atlanta Broadcast Studio, 2030 Powers Ferry Rd SE, Atlanta, Georgia, USA::(studio)
imdb.plot outline: Coffee with America is a weekly television show that will bring you up to speed on "what's brewing'" in news, social media and pop culture- without the caffeine crash. Fun, fast-paced and interactive, we're taking your favorite local coffee shop to the national stage.
imdb.title: Coffee with America
plot: Weekly television show hosted by Ebony Steele and Sasha Rionda, the show focuses on the issues that have made these ladies famous. Everything from lifestyle to celebrities, health to entertainment.

_Coffee with America_ (qv) is a weekly television show that will bring you up to speed on "what's brewing'" in news, social media and pop culture- without the caffeine crash. Fun, fast-paced and interactive, we're taking your favorite local coffee shop to the national stage.::_Coffee with America_ (qv)
